title: Tom Jones And Cerys Matthews - Baby It's Cold Outside
description:
Video Promo:
720x404
xvid

Tom Jones And Cerys Matthews of Catatonia fame doing a good version of Baby It&#039;s Cold Outside. I&#039;d say it must have been filmed in Tom Jones house.

Lyrics:
I really can&#039;t stay
But baby, it&#039;s cold outside
I&#039;ve got to go away
Ah, baby, it&#039;s cold outside
This evening has been
Been hoping that you&#039;d drop in
So very nice
I&#039;ll hold your hands, they&#039;re just like ice
My mother will start to worry
Beautiful, what&#039;s your hurry
My father will be pacing the floor
Listen to that fireplace roar
So really I&#039;d better scurry
Oh beautiful, please don&#039;t hurry
Maybe just a half a drink more
Why don&#039;t you put some records on while
The neighbours might think
Oh baby, it&#039;s bad out there
Say, what&#039;s in this drink
There&#039;s no cabs to be had out there
I wish I knew how
Your eyes are like starlight now
To break this spell
I&#039;ll take your hat, your hair looks swell
I ought to say no, no, no, sir
Mind if I move a little closer
At least I&#039;m gonna say that I tried
What&#039;s the sense of hurting my pride
I really can&#039;t stay
Baby don&#039;t hold out
Ahh, but it&#039;s cold outside
I simply must go
Oh, baby, it&#039;s cold outside
The answer is no
You know it&#039;s cold outside
This welcome has been
I&#039;m lucky that you dropped in
So nice and warm
Look out the window at that storm
My sister will be suspicious
Oh, your lips look delicious
My brother will be there at the door
Like waves upon a tropical shore
My maiden aunt&#039;s mind is vicious
Eww, your lips are delicious
Well maybe just a cigarette more
Never such a blizzard before
I&#039;ve got to go home
Ah, baby, you would freeze out there
Say, lend me a comb
You know it&#039;s up to your knees out there
You&#039;ve really been grand
I thrill when you touch my hand
But don&#039;t you see
How can you do this thing to me
There&#039;s bound to be talk tomorrow
Making my life long sorrow
At least there will plenty implied
If you caught pneumonia and died
I really can&#039;t stay
Get over that old out
Ah but it&#039;s cold outside.
